sectionData.title: Competitive Advantage
sectionData.content: Wages and benefits are big part of the costs, so choosing a location like Peru, where wages are significantly lower compared to pay scale of the U.S., Canada, Western Europe and other Latin American countries, will have a positive impact in your operations.
sectionData.markdownContent:
# Competitive Advantage

Wages and benefits are big part of the costs, so choosing a location like Peru, where wages are significantly lower compared to pay scale of the U.S., Canada, Western Europe and other Latin American countries, will have a positive impact in your operations.
